events.message: Filed a claim after my car was involved in a collision at the intersection, sustaining heavy front-end damage.
The claim has been officially categorised under 'Auto Accident' based on the description of the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the claim and will be contacting me soon for further details.
I received a confirmation that my auto accident claim has been acknowledged and logged in the system.
The insurance company requested additional documents including the police report and car repair estimate.
Submitted all requested documents promptly, including photos of the damage and the official police report.
Investigation into the details of the car accident has started to determine liability and damage extent.
The investigation regarding the auto accident is complete and the findings have been documented for review.
The insurer proposed a settlement amount covering the estimated repair costs and related expenses.
Provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the prompt settlement proposal and assistance throughout.
Received formal approval for the claim and confirmation that payment will be processed shortly.
The payment for the approved auto accident claim has been issued directly to my designated bank account.
The auto accident claim has been fully closed and all related matters are considered resolved.
